Rentan Bencana Alam, Manggala Garuda Putih Edukasi Masyarakat Jaga Hutan
04 Nov 2019, 21:52 by Azis Zulkarnaen Handoyo


Rentan Bencana Alam, Manggala Garuda Putih Edukasi Masyarakat Jaga Hutan

KBRN, Bandung: Mengantisipasi bencana alam memasuki musim penghujan saat ini, Organisasi Masyarakat (Ormas) Manggala Garuda Putih (MGP) mengajak masyarakat khususnya di wilayah Pangalengan kab. Bandung, untuk menjaga kelestarian hutan. Ketua Biro Hukum LBH DPP MGP M. Ijudin Rahmat mengatakan, pihaknya memberikan pengetahuan dan eduksi kepada masyarakat pentingnya menjaga hutan lindung, khususnya saat penghujan tiba. Dikatakan Ijudin yang juga berniat maju dalam Pilkada Kabupaten Bandung ini, bencana alam seperti banjir dan tanah longsor adalah akibat berubahnya fungsi hutan. Hutan yang seharusnya menyerap air dan menahan tanah, beralih fungsi menjadi lahan pertanian.“Salah satu penyebab penyebab banjir atau bencana alam adalah alih fungsi hutan. Makanya kita mencoba mengedukasi petani supaya hutan biarkan tetap menjadi hutan lindung, apabila mereka tetap ingin bertani bercocok tanam kita sudah bekerjasama dengan PTPN VIII. Siapapun petani yang ingin bercocok tanam dan memanfaatkan lahan PTPN VIII,”ungkapnya disela acara di Pangalengan Kab. Bandung Senin (4/11/2019).Lebih lanjut dikatakan Ijudin, dengan adanya kerjasama dengan PTPN VIII, para petani bisa memanfaatkan lahan dan tidak mengganggu hutan. Sehingga keseimbangan hutan sebagai ekosistem serta fungsi hutan tetap terjaga.“Ada beberapa blok yang penggarapannya sesuai dengan lingkungan, agar menjadi penyerapan air hujan dan penahan longsor. Ini mudah-mudahan dicanangkan sampai dengan tahun 2020 akhir program kita bisa terlaksana di hutan lindung kabupaten Bandung,”ucapnya.Ia juga menambahkan, dengan adanya upaya edukasi pentingnya menjaga kelestarian hutan lindung, para petani sudah mulai mengerti dan merubah pola bercocok tanam maupun memilih lahan. Apalagi pihaknya tegas Ijudin, sudah bekerjasama dengan PTPN VIII yang menyediakan lahan pertanian yang aman bagi lingkungan.“Kalau di wilayah kabupaten Bandung inikan kebanyakan lahan dimiliki oleh PTPN VIII. Kita upayakan advokasi terkait perijinan pemanfaatan untuk petani tersebut, dengan mekanisme hukum yang berlaku dengan prinsip saling menguntungkan. Jadi petani untung, PTPN untung. Dan masyarakat juga dapat menikmati kesimbangan alam,”jelasnya.Sementara disela pemberian pengetahuan dan edukasi para petani pentingnya menjaga kelestarian alam dan menjaga hutan lindung, Ormas Manggala Garuda Putih juga mendeklarasikan dukungannya bagi Ijudin Rahmat untuk maju di pesta demokrasi pemilihan bupati Bandung. Ijudin sendiri akan maju dari jalur independen.

Vulnerable to Natural Disasters, Garuda White Manggala Educates People to Protect the Forest
Nov 04 2019, 21:52 by Azis Zulkarnaen Handoyo


Vulnerable to Natural Disasters, Garuda White Manggala Educates People to Protect the Forest

KBRN, Bandung: Anticipating natural disasters entering the current rainy season, the Manggala Garuda Putih (MGP) Community Organization (MGP) invites the public especially in the Pangalengan area of the regency. Bandung, to preserve the forest. The Head of the Legal Bureau of the Legal Aid Institute for Legal Sciences, MGP M. Ijudin Rahmat, said that his party provided knowledge and eduction to the community the importance of protecting protected forests, especially during the rainy season. It was said by Ijudin who also intends to advance in the Bandung District Election, natural disasters such as floods and landslides are the result of changes in forest functions. Forests which are supposed to absorb water and hold soil, are converted to agriculture. "One of the causes of floods or natural disasters is forest conversion. So we are trying to educate farmers so that the forest can remain a protected forest, if they still want to farm, we have collaborated with PTPN VIII. Anyone who wants to grow crops and use PTPN VIII land, "he said interrupting the event in Pangalengan District. Bandung Monday (11/04/2019). Furthermore Ijudin said, with the cooperation with PTPN VIII, farmers could use the land and not disturb the forest. So that the balance of the forest as an ecosystem as well as the function of the forest is maintained. "There are several blocks that are cultivated in accordance with the environment, so that it becomes rain water absorption and retaining landslides. Hopefully this will be announced until the end of 2020, our program can be implemented in the protected forests of Bandung regency, "he said. He also added, with the effort to educate the importance of preserving protected forests, farmers have begun to understand and change the pattern of planting and choosing land. . Moreover, he firmly stated Ijudin, has collaborated with PTPN VIII, which provides agricultural land that is safe for the environment. "In the district of Bandung, most of the land is owned by PTPN VIII. We seek advocacy related to licensing for the utilization of these farmers, with legal mechanisms that apply to the principle of mutual benefit. So the profit farmers, PTPN profit. And the public can also enjoy the balance of nature, "he explained. While interrupted by the provision of knowledge and education to farmers about the importance of preserving nature and protecting protected forests, the Garuda White Manggala Community Organization also declared its support for Ijudin Rahmat to advance at the democratic party elections in Bandung regents. Ijudin himself will advance from the independent path.
